BiblioData.Title: Method for doping a polymer
BiblioData.Abstract: A polymer composition comprising a conjugated polymer doped with a redox dopant moiety.

Claims.P: 1. A polymer composition comprising a conjugated polymer doped with a redox dopant moiety.

2. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 1, wherein the redox dopant moiety is based on one of tetracyanoquinodimethane (TCNQ), dichlorodicyanoquinone (DDQ), tetrathiafulvalene {TTF), ferrocene, viologen, iron (III) chelates, and precursors thereof.
3. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 1, wherein the conjugated polymer comprises poly(alkylfluorene).
4. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 1, wherein the conjugated polymer is a copolymer.
5. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 4, wherein the copolymer comprises alkylfluorene and triarylamine repeat units.
6. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 1, wherein the dopant is blended with the conjugated polymer in a mixture.
7. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 6, wherein the dopant is chemically bound to a polymer which is blended with the conjugated polymer in the mixture.
8. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 7, wherein the polymer comprising the dopant is conjugated.
9. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 1, wherein the dopant is chemically bound to the conjugated polymer.
10. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 9, wherein the dopant is provided in a pendant group of the conjugated polymer.
11. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 10, wherein the dopant moiety is chemically bound to the conjugated polymer via a spacer group.
12. A conductive polymer composition according to claim 11, wherein the spacer group comprises an alkyl or aryl group.
13. An electrical device comprising a polymer composition, the polymer composition comprising a conjugated polymer doped with a redox dopant moiety.

14. An electrical device according to claim 13, wherein the redox dopant moiety is based on one of tetracyanoquinodimethane (TCNQ), dichlorodicyanoquinone (DDQ), tetrathiafulvalene (TTF), ferrocene, viologen, iron (III) chelates, and precursors thereof.
15. An electrical device according to claim 13, wherein the electrical device is an optoelectronic device.
